months and days of the week slightly affect security trading:
- wednesdays are uneventful, historically the s&p hasn't changed much on wednesdays
- january is subject to seasonal tendancies of stocks to rise, february doesn't experience this as strongly 
- stocks are affected by special events - avoided major holidays
